Kurwa nienawidze tej gry, za każdym razem jak odpalam mecz to mi sie chce płakać, kurwa ruskie dzieci drą pizde, a reszta lobby to jacyś pierdoleni hackerzy bez życia co mają przegrane 500000 godzin w te gre.

The game is Amazing, Fan following is great. Play this game and watch CS GO majors and other tournaments and you will be happy in your life.
The only thing which makes me sad is while playing competitive, we get a lot of wallers. and then all the fun goes away.Also valve is trying hard to tackle this massive problem.

Gameplay: 9/10 - one of the most fun, replayable and intense online experiences you will ever have
Ongoing development: 6/10 - developers at valve continue to update, monitor and enhance gameplay years after release. However, they mainly use it as a cash cow (i.e. money for skins/crates etc)
Community: 1/10 - predominantly North Americans and Europeans, the majority of which are toxic and use horrific language not seen in any other game I have ever played.
Overall: 7/10
